tool_description: An API showing current avalanche risk in Tatras
title: Tatry Avalanche Risk

api_list.name: Information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tatry-avalanche-risk.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tatry-avalanche-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get current Tatras avalanche risk
api_list.description: Will return current Tatras avalanche risk
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tatry-avalanche-risk.p.rapidapi.com/v1/avalanche-risk"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tatry-avalanche-risk.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
